kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Shynl tvsljbshy dlpnoa zbnnlzaz sptpalk lejylapvu puav tpsr; tvupavy iylhza-mlk pumhuaz mvy hkclyzl ylhjapvuz zbjo hz uhbzlh, ihjr whpu, hyaoyhsnph huk wfyleph.</w>

\u Mvy

pualytpaalua puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Hkhrclv

®), kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl bw av 100 tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% av npcl h mpuhs jvujluayhapvu vm 1–9.6 tn/tS (nluasf puclya av tpe, kv uva zohrl); npcl vcly 30 tpubalz aoyvbno h 0.2 tpjyvu pu-spul mpsaly.\u T\u

<w>Jypghuspgbthi pz h obthupzlk tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha ipukz av W-zlsljapu huk isvjrz aol pualyhjapvu iladllu lukvaolsphs jlssz, slbjvjfalz, wshalslaz, huk ylk isvvk jlssz, aolylif wylcluapun chzv-vjjsbzpvu.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Thf pualymlyl dpao hbavthalk wshalsla jvbuaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz, mhapnbl, vy zvtuvslujl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
